articles.title: American Heart Association: Sleep Duration Is Essential Component for Heart and Brain Health - SciTechDaily
articles.description: American Heart Association adds sleep to cardiovascular health checklist. The American Heart Association has updated its checklist to measure cardiovascular health. It is now called Life’s Essential 8™ and adds healthy sleep as essential for optimal cardiovas…
articles.content:
ByAmerican Heart AssociationJune 29, 2022
American Heart Association has added healthy sleep as essential for optimal cardiovascular health.
